About Me

A little something to help you get to know me

BIO

I am currently a Computer Engineering student in Academic Term 3 at Memorial Univeristy of Newfoundland. As I progress further in my life as an engineering student, I want to learn more and increase my knowledge to better help the society. I have a deep rooted passion for hardware as well as software. Building computers is something that I have been doing for a long time now. What started as a small time hobby, turned into a small business, which grew into a passion and before I knew it, I was on a plane, to learn more about the crazy world of hardware innovation. But that is not all! I've been learning software programming and have honed my skills in quite a few languages (namely C++ and Java) which helped me realize the working principles of not only the hardware, but the software which ties it all together. Being a fast learner has helped me in my journey of acquiring more knowledge, and I hope to continue doing so, as I transition from being a student to a professional engineer.
